overview:
Shahid Azim is the founder of Lantos Technologies, an novel new 3D imaging technology spin out from MIT, that aims to make revolutionize the way people experience hearing aids and earphones. He was previously the founder and CEO of Braintree Group, a business process outsourcing firm with 24x7 operations on three continents.

Shahid holds Bachelors in Finance from Seattle University, post graduate in management from Harvard University and an MBA from MIT. He was a Sloan Fellow class of 2009.
